title: CDC resolver may cause TiKV OOM
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

Similar to #14864, CDC has its own resolver, and it may cause OOM too.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

\> 4.0.0

### Steps to reproduce

Run a large txn that is much greater than TiKV memory size.

### What did you expect?

No OOM.

### What did happened?

OOM.
